Get ready for DNCE
DNCE is coming to Kuala Lumpur! Martell NCF would like to bring you to see the “Best New Artist” of this year’s MTV Video Music Awards, multi-platinum selling band DNCE.
10 Martell NCF fans will be invited to the show just by answering the questions in the link before 4th August 2017.
You have one chance to send in an entry, so make it count. The most creative answers win.
Are you ready?
Join the show! <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MYA_BRD_MRT_1707_DNCE_NL_Page-Registration.html?ASI_LUX_Gender__c_lead={{lead.Gender (L)}}&FirstName={{lead.First Name}}&LastName={{lead.Last Name}}&Email={{lead.Email Address}}&ASI_LUX_Birthday_Day__c={{company.Birthday (Day)}}&ASI_LUX_Birthday_Month__c={{company.Birthday (Month)}}&ASI_CRM_Birthday_Year__c={{lead.Birthday (Year)}}&MobilePhone={{lead.Mobile Phone Number}}&ASI_LUX_Preferred_Alcohol_Brand_1__c={{company.Preferred Alcohol Brand 1}}]]>
*You will be notified if you are among the lucky 10 to win a ticket by 7th August 2017. Tickets can be picked up at Pernod Ricard Malaysia, Suite 13 A01, Menara PJ, Amcorp Trade Centre, 18, Jalan Persiaran Barat, 46050 Petaling Jaya, Selangor, Malaysia
9 am – 5 pm, on 8th August 2017.
Party on with Martell NCF
If you can’t join us on 8th August, find the next Martell NCF Invasion Parties near to you.
Click and like our FB page <[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]> to find out where are the latest Martell NCF Invasion parties.
